name: Aliens TD
description:
★★★★ The best new addictive and awesome Game! ★★★★

Aliens TD is a fun Game for FREE!

This game is a student project > Support it!

You are the Aliens and have to capture the crazy Humans who try to destroy your ship!

Use the Galactic Shop to exchange Humans for new towers or new upgrades!

★★★ Story ★★★
Aliens are coming on Earth!
They discover a nice planet with prehistoric Humans!
But Humans are idiots and violents and they want to destroy the Alien's Spaceship!
So, Aliens decide to capture and sell bad Humans on the Galactic Shop to get new
stuff, more powerful!

Hope you enjoy!
If you like it, please rate this application!

★★★ Game Features ★★★
• This is a student project!
• Control Aliens
• Cartoon graphics
• 6 diferents Aliens towers
• 3 upgrades for each tower
• Unlock and buy new towers
• Large map to use strategic defense
• "Capture", not "kill" Humans
• Exchange Humans in the Galactic Shop
• Infinite level improvement
• The difficulty constantly increases!

★★★★ Available now for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch for FREE! ★★★★
